reviews.review_msg: Interesting course, extremely helpful teacher. She's approachable and a really nice lady
Great teacher, loved attending lectures and always discussed interesting topics. Would definitely take other classes with her.

Jordana was one of the nicest profs I have ever had at SFU. She goes out of her way to make sure students are doing well. Assignments are very fair and marked fair too. She tries to make classes interesting. Recommend taking a class with her.

Jordana is the best prof I have ever had at SFU. She is so unbelievably kind and welcoming and really strives to make sure everyone understands each concept. She has a clear love and passion for crim and teaching, which makes lectures much more enjoyable. I will be taking any class she teaches from here on out!
